name: Shurik'n'Light
description:
You are a Ninja !

You must turn on the city's light.

Arrow keys to move (or WASD)

Space to Jump

Shift to run

Click to throw a shuriken

R to restart a level

Shuriken can turn on lights and activate levers.

Made in 6 day for the weekly Gam Jam #144

Created By : Traquall - RedPanda - Anagareth
